articles.author: Dan Mangan
articles.title: SNAP benefits: Appeals court again rejects Trump admin bid to halt full payment order - CNBC
articles.description: The question of whether the Trump administration can be compelled to pay 42 million Americans full food stamp benefits is set to return to the Supreme Court.
articles.content: A federal appeals court in Boston, for a second time, late Sunday flatly rejected a request by the Trump administration to block a lower court judge's order that it pay 42 million Americans their ful… [+3759 chars]
